# About
This workshop presented by R-Ladies Johannesburg will dive into using functions in Rtistry. While no experience is required to learn from the presentation, it is assumed that the viewer has some base knowledge in basic rtistry concepts and functions in R.

# Presentation
The slides for this workshop can be viewed [here](https://meghansaha.github.io/Functions_in_Rtistry/).

# Live Coding Code
Will be available after the presentation. A link will be created and placed here.
